property.name: targetPath
property.description: Path to which artifact must be copied to on the host.

property.name: targetPathShared
property.description: Is the targetPath shared by others on the host. When true, the targetPath is not deleted during undeployment; only the artifacts copied to it.

property.name: uploadOnly
property.description: Is the targetPath shared by others on the host. When true, the targetPath is not deleted during undeployment; only the artifacts copied to it.

property.name: diffWithRemoteTemp
property.description: Use a remote temporary directory for the diff process

property.name: diffWithPreviousArtifact
property.description: Compare with the previous artifact inside Deploy for the diff process
